citations.narrative:
* The licensee currently has as part of her inventory of animals, seven foxes and a spider monkey. The license issued to
this licensee does not authorize the use of exotic and wild canids or group 6 nonhuman primates. Authorized use of
designated groups of animals promotes compliance with the Animal Welfare Act. The licensee must obtain a new license
before using any animals beyond the types or numbers authorized under the existing license. To be corrected by not
using the foxes and spider monkey for regulated activity by end of the day on 6 June 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
Additional Inspectors:
MARGARET SHAVER, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
2.1(b)(2)(ii) 
   
Requirements and application 
* The licensee currently has as part of her inventory of animals, seven foxes and a spider monkey. The license issued to 
this licensee does not authorize the use of exotic and wild canids or group 6 nonhuman primates. Authorized use of 
designated groups of animals promotes compliance with the Animal Welfare Act. The licensee must obtain a new license 
before using any animals beyond the types or numbers authorized under the existing license. To be corrected by not 
using the foxes and spider monkey for regulated activity by end of the day on 6 June 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
MARGARET SHAVER, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

species.common: RED FOX (INCLUDES SILVER FOX & CROSS FOX)
